meanings.sent1: I bought two tix for the concert.
meanings.sent2: The tix for the show were sold out quickly.
meanings.sent3: The tix for the movie were so tiny, I almost lost them!
meanings.sent4: Her tix to success were hard work and determination.
meanings.sent5: The golden tix shimmered in the sunlight, promising adventure.

meanings.sent1: Don't forget to pick up your tix at the counter.

meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my tix at home, what a silly mistake!
